recipesJson.name: Tropical NicSalt Recipe
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This recipe is to showcase the best way to mix with Nicotine Salts.
A simple tropical recipe using all my favorite Capella flavorings

reviews.text: decent recipe, lemon lime seems to overpower everything else
it's a bit throaty in my berserker, i think that's the lemon lime but it was enjoyable
